channel.description: Recent content in tools on Sparrow10

item.title: Glot, a runnable pastebin
item.description: Some time ago, I discovered glot.io, an open-source pastebin with runnable snippets and API. Having all these programming languages in one online REPL is impressive, and convenient. In a future post, I will show some of my dumbest and most funny snippets. See you next time.
